T02D1811:145b-1: karma aanta bi bha ng+ga n'a ma /
T02D1811:145b-3: las kyi mtha' rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1811:145b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1811:145b-5: thog ma dbus mtha' spangs pa yi //
T02D1811:145b-6: stong pa bzhi la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1811:145b-7: thams cad dag cing rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1811:145b-8: rim pa'i dbye bas nges sbyar bya //
T02D1811:145b-9: ye shes rnam gsum las byung ba //
T02D1811:145b-10: khams bzhi dang ni dbang po drug / phung po lnga dang sgo dgu dang //
T02D1811:145b-11: 'gro ba gsum po phal cher ni //
T02D1811:145b-12: skye gnas rnam pa bzhi yin te //
T02D1811:145b-13: sgong skyes dang ni mngal skyes dang //
T02D1811:145b-14: drod gsher skyes ni gsum pa yin //
T02D1811:145b-15: bzhi pa yang ni rdzus skyes so //
T02D1811:145b-16: thog med sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa //
T02D1811:145b-17: rnam shes gsum po bsgoms pas ni //
T02D1811:145b-18: dus gsum du ni spyad pa'i las //
T02D1811:145b-19: rnam shes gsum gyi rgyu can no //
T02D1811:145b-20: ye shes gsum po zhes brjod pa //
T02D1811:145b-21: de yang snang ba tsam nyid de //
T02D1811:145b-22: dang po ma rig shes par bya //
T02D1811:145b-23: gnyis pa de bzhin sems las byung //
T02D1811:145b-24: gsum pa sems zhes bya 'di rnams //
T02D1811:145b-25: stong nyid gsum du brjod pa yin //
T02D1811:145b-26: stong nyid gsum las byung ba'i rlung //
T02D1811:145b-27: de nyid dang ni kun du gnas //
T02D1811:145b-28: de yi bzhon pa nyid 'gyur te //
T02D1811:145b-29: bdag nyid kyang ni stong pa'i phyir //
T02D1811:145b-30: rnam shes las ni rlung 'byung ste //
T02D1811:145b-31: de las me ni yang dag 'byung //
T02D1811:145b-33: de las yang ni sa 'byung ngo//
T02D1811:146a-0: @146a * // de rnams las ni phung po 'byung //
T02D1811:146a-1: de las yang ni skye mched 'byung //
T02D1811:146a-2: de las ye shes rang bzhin rnams //
T02D1811:146a-3: brgya ni drug cu dang bcas slar //
T02D1811:146a-5: la lar mya ngan zhi ba nyid //
T02D1811:146a-6: la lar byams dang snying rje dang //
T02D1811:146a-7: so sor rtog dang yid gang dang //
T02D1811:146a-8: la lar sred pa rnam rtog dang //
T02D1811:146a-9: rig bya rig dang ngo che shes //
T02D1811:146a-10: dal dang mi dge rang bzhin med //
T02D1811:146a-11: nye bar len dang sogs pa dang //
T02D1811:146a-12: la lar bkres skom ser sna dang //
T02D1811:146a-13: la lar dogs dang tshor pa ste //
T02D1811:146a-14: sems kyi rang bzhin 'di rnams ni //
T02D1811:146a-15: snang ba'i ye shes rgyu can no //
T02D1811:146a-16: skad cig 'dod chags de bzhin dga' //
T02D1811:146a-17: la lar gdug pa nus pa dang //
T02D1811:146a-18: la lar nga rgyal de bzhin spro //
T02D1811:146a-19: la lar rangs pa btsan thabs 'gar //
T02D1811:146a-20: la lar brtan dang stobs can nyid //
T02D1811:146a-21: la lar ngag ni gsal bar 'gyur //
T02D1811:146a-22: la lar bden dang mi bden dang//
T02D1811:146a-23: la lar spro byed byed po yang //
T02D1811:146a-24: la lar dpa' bo brtson 'grus dang //
T02D1811:146a-25: ngo tsha med dang bskul ba 'gar //
T02D1811:146a-26: 'gar yang ngo mtshar drag po dang //
T02D1811:146a-27: zhe 'gras sbyin pa po nyid dang //
T02D1811:146a-28: mi srun pa nyid gya gyu nyid //
T02D1811:146a-29: rnam par sgeg pa'ang sems las byung //
T02D1811:146a-30: brjed ngas pa dang la lar 'khrul //
T02D1811:146a-31: la lar rnam par g-yeng ba nyid //
T02D1811:146a-32: le lo nyid dang la lar ngal //
T02D1811:146a-33: la lar mi smra'i dngos por 'gyur //
T02D1811:146a-34: la lar the tshom nyid shes bya //
T02D1811:146a-35: ma rig pa yi dus su 'byung //
T02D1811:146a-36: ye shes rang bzhin 'di rnams ni //
T02D1811:146a-37: lnga bcu rtsa bzhi dag tu bshad //
T02D1811:146a-38: mtshan mo nyin mo'i dbye ba yis //
T02D1811:146a-39: yang nas yang du rab tu 'jug / bzhi rnams so so'i dor son pa /
T02D1811:146a-40: de bzhin phung po dbang po la'o //
T02D1811:146a-41: sngon ni ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin //
T02D1811:146a-43: dang po sa ni chu la 'jug / chu ni me la thim 'gyur zhing //
T02D1811:146a-44: me ni rlung la thim par 'gyur//
T02D1811:146a-45: rlung ni rnam par shes la 'jug / rnam shes 'dzin par gshegs nas su //
T02D1811:146a-46: 'od gsal bar ni de nas zhugs //
T02D1811:146a-47: de las dri za nyid gyur nas //
T02D1811:146a-48: las kyis bskul las skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1811:146a-49: de ltar skye ba stong rnams su //
T02D1811:146a-50: skyes shing skyes nas yang dang yang //
T02D1811:146b-0: rang bzhin @146b bskor zhing kun du 'khrul //
T02D1811:146b-1: rtog ge rnams kyi yul min la //
T02D1811:146b-2: snang ba yongs su shes pa ni //
T02D1811:146b-4: snang ba rnyed pa dag kyang ni //
T02D1811:146b-5: slar yang rnyed pa shin tu dka' //
T02D1811:146b-6: rdul dang mun pa snying stobs shes //
T02D1811:146b-7: 'di ni gzhan gyis kun du brtags //
T02D1811:146b-8: snang ba gsum po 'di nyid kyi //
T02D1811:146b-9: rang bzhin shes pa spangs pa'i phyir //
T02D1811:146b-10: srid dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu //
T02D1811:146b-11: ye shes gsum po 'di ru bzhed //
T02D1811:146b-12: snang ba'i rang bzhin gang du gnas //
T02D1811:146b-13: de ru sdig dang bsod nams dag / snang ba gsum po dag pa ni //
T02D1811:146b-14: nges par bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas //
T02D1811:146b-15: tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang //
T02D1811:146b-16: gang gzhan ser skya la sogs rnams //
T02D1811:146b-17: rang bzhin snang ba kun du rmongs //
T02D1811:146b-18: rnam dag la yang rnam kun du //
T02D1811:146b-19: bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang //
T02D1811:146b-20: mgo dang rin chen sogs sbyin pas //
T02D1811:146b-21: snang ba rnam par ma dag na //
T02D1811:146b-23: mtha' yas bskal pa rnams su yang //
T02D1811:146b-24: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod sogs kyis //
T02D1811:146b-25: snang ba rnam par ma dag na //
T02D1811:146b-27: mtha' yas bskal pa rnams su yang //
T02D1811:146b-28: sngags kyi sku yi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D1811:146b-29: snang ba rnam par ma dag na //
T02D1811:146b-31: snang ba gsum po dag pa ni //
T02D1811:146b-32: thams cad mkhyen nyid the tshom med //
T02D1811:146b-33: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim nyid kyis //
T02D1811:146b-34: de ni thob 'gyur gzhan gyis min //
T02D1811:146b-35: sprin ni 'brug sgra'i rnam pa dang ldan nam //
T02D1811:146b-36: nam mkha'i khong nas kun du 'byung ba rnams //
T02D1811:146b-37: phyogs bcu bskor nas gnas shing de nyid du //
T02D1811:146b-38: slar yang yal bar mthong ba ji lta ba //
T02D1811:146b-39: de ltar rnam shes rnams ni 'od gsal gnas las 'thon zhing slar yang zhig gyur nas //
T02D1811:146b-40: rang bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs rnams su gnas shing de nyid du ni yal bar 'gyur //
T02D1811:146b-41: las kyi mtha' rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba
T02D1811:146b-42: rje btsun 'phags pa klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa
T02D1811:146b-44: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun ma ni ka shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02D1811:146b-45: bla ma rje btsun chen po re ben ta'i zhal
T02D1811:146b-46: snga nas gus par mnyan nas chag lo ts'a ba
T02D1811:146b-47: sh'akya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus
